Html:
Hi All,

I recently modified the APA.xsl file for ASCE style bibliography. Hope this will be helpful for some of you:
ASCE.xsl

Feel free to contact me if any bug shows up :)

I just wanted to acknowledge your efforts in sharing this. To get it to work on my machine (running Word 2011), I had to change the encoding to utf-8 at two locations in the code, but now (at least preliminarily), it seems to be working.

Thanks!

-Ben

Hi,

It looks doesn't work for Word 2013, do you have any update for this?
